titles.title: PAWS Act of 2018
To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide service dogs to veterans with mental illnesses who do not have mobility impairments.
PAWS Act of 2018
Puppies Assisting Wounded Servicemembers Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Puppies Assisting Wounded Servicemembers Act of 2018 or the PAWS Act of 2018
This bill authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs to provide service dogs to certain veterans regardless of whether they have a mobility impairment.
